page.title: 16CLUBS
page.content: Wrestlingworth is an active village. There are always social events being held here. Village Day is a big event held in July, when country crafts and Morris Dancers can be seen. A recent group was formed to raise money to provide swings and other apparatus for the local children to play on in the village playing field. "Swings" invited local M.P. Nicholas Lyall to their opening ceremony in May 1985. Other events throughout the year include Sports Days, Bistros, Dances, Whist Drives, Barbecues with something happening most weekends.
